languages.text: "Ставьте в этой графе прочерк, "коллега". И сделайте пометку на моем бланке — "Перед прочтением сжечь".
"Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"
languages.original_text: "Ставьте в этой графе прочерк, "коллега". И сделайте пометку на моем бланке — "Перед прочтением сжечь".

traits.locale_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague'. And add a note on top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading'."

languages.text: «Ponga "N/A" en ese campo, "compañero". Y añada una nota en el encabezado de mi ficha que diga "quemar antes de leer"».
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: «Ponga "N/A" en ese campo, "compañero". Y añada una nota en el encabezado de mi ficha que diga "quemar antes de leer"».

languages.text: “是保密部门，我的‘同事’。另外，在我的清单最顶部加一行注释——‘阅后即焚’。”
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: “是保密部门，我的‘同事’。另外，在我的清单最顶部加一行注释——‘阅后即焚’。”

languages.text: 「該当なしだ、『同僚さん』。それから、俺のシートの一番上に『読む前に焼却』という注釈を付け加えておけ」
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: 「該当なしだ、『同僚さん』。それから、俺のシートの一番上に『読む前に焼却』という注釈を付け加えておけ」

languages.text: « Si on vous pose la question, vous n'aurez qu'à dire que vous ne savez pas, "collègue". Et pendant que vous y êtes, ajoutez donc la mention "détruire avant lecture" tout en haut de ma fiche signalétique. »
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: « Si on vous pose la question, vous n'aurez qu'à dire que vous ne savez pas, "collègue". Et pendant que vous y êtes, ajoutez donc la mention "détruire avant lecture" tout en haut de ma fiche signalétique. »

languages.text: "O alana 'yok' yazacaksın 'meslektaşım'. Bir de sayfamın en üst kısmına 'Okumadan önce yakın.' diye bir not ekle."
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: "O alana 'yok' yazacaksın 'meslektaşım'. Bir de sayfamın en üst kısmına 'Okumadan önce yakın.' diye bir not ekle."

languages.text: "Schreibt 'keine Angaben' in dieses Feld, 'Kollege'. Und macht einen Aktenvermerkt wie "Vor dem Lesen verbrennen'."
languages.original_text: "Put 'N/A' in that field, 'colleague.' And add a note at the top of my sheet that says, 'burn before reading.'"

traits.locale_text: "Schreibt 'keine Angaben' in dieses Feld, 'Kollege'. Und macht einen Aktenvermerkt wie "Vor dem Lesen verbrennen'."
